104538.name: Mobile (BOND Internet Trends (2019))
104538.description: Hours per day spent with digital media using mobile. Mobile includes smartphone & tablet.
104538.datasetName: Daily hours spent with digital media per adult user, US (BOND Internet Trends (2019))

source.name: BOND Internet Trends (2019)
source.dataPublisherSource: eMarketer 9/14 (2008-2010), eMarketer 4/15 (2011-2013), eMarketer 4/17 (2014-2015), eMarketer 10/18 (2016-2018). Note: Other connected devices include OTT & game consoles. Mobile includes smartphone & tablet. Usage includes both home & work for consumers 18+. Non deduped defined as time spent with each medium individually, regardless of multitasking.
source.additionalInfo: Other connected devices include over-the-top (OTT) & game consoles. Mobile includes smartphone & tablet. Usage includes both home & work for consumers 18+. Non deduped is defined as the time spent with each medium individually, regardless of multitasking.

104539.name: Desktop/Laptop (BOND Internet Trends (2019))
104539.description: Hours per day spent with digital media using desktop/laptop.

104540.name: Other Connected Devices (BOND Internet Trends (2019))
104540.description: Hours per day spent with digital media using other connected devices. Other connected devices include over-the-top (OTT) & game consoles. An over-the-top application is any app or service that provides a product over the internet. For example, OTT providers include Netflix and Amazon Video offering video streaming services.
